name: Run Twist
description:
Imagine a world ranking made up of the best runners in the world, where you compete to reach the first place! The gameplay is really simple, you just have to avoid the colorful obstacles on the path tapping the screen of your smartphone to change direction to your runner.
Try to overcome each level, leading you to the world ranking and demonstrating to others players to be the best. And if you have any difficulties don't worry, you can always slow down the time, halve the obstacles on the path or drink a potion to become a ghost and cross the obstacles!
Earn coins during the course and if you have a lot you can buy some hats to flaunt in the world ranking, be envied by the other players while wearing the mythical crown!
The graphics of the game is minimal and full of colors to focus on the action and make your ascent to success pleasant for your eyes!

► World Ranking
► One-Tap Gameplay
► Colourful and minimal graphics
► Unbridled Action
